title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: From the moment you open your eyes in the morning until your head hits the pillow at days end, you are liable to be brimming with enthusiasm today. The prospect of starting something new puts extra spring in your step, even if you are not yet sure about the precise shape your project will take. Brainstorming with the right partner or group can help you corral your zeal and channel it into your work. Visualize the future and the picture grows clearer. Astrologer Caroline Casey said, "Imagination lays the tracks for the reality train to follow." Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
